title.rendered: Jazz Airlines (fly jazz) Canada Address | Phone | Email

content.rendered:
Jazz Airlines (Jazz Aviation LP), is a Canadian regional airline based at Halifax Stanfield International Airport in Enfield, Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia, and is a wholly owned subsidiary of Chorus Aviation.  It was established in 2001. Jazz Aviation provides regional and charter airline services in Canada and the United States, primarily under contract to Air Canada using the brand name Air Canada Express, and also as Jazz Charters.

 

Verified & Updated on 24/2/21

Jazz Airlines Halifax

Jazz Airlines Halifax Address:
 Head Office
3 Spectacle Lake Drive
Suite 100
Dartmouth, Nova Scotia B3B 1W8
Canada

Operations Centre
310 Goudey Drive,
Enfield, NS B2T 1E4

Phone:
  (902) 873-5000

Email: services@flyjazz.ca.

Jazz Airlines Richmond, Vancouver, Canada

5520 Miller Road,
Richmond, British Columbia V7B lL9
Canada

Jazz Airlines Calgary AB, Canada

8050 22nd Street NE,
Calgary, Alberta T2E 7H6
Canada

Jazz Airlines Mississauga Ontario, Canada

5955 Airport Road, Suite 318
Mississauga, Ontario L4V 1R9
Canada

Jazz Airlines Montreal QC, Canada

740 Cote Vertu West, Station 56,
Montreal, QC H4Y 1C1

For any technical support, email to websupport@flyjazz.ca, taleosupport@flyjazz.ca.

To contact Media Relations team, please email media@flyjazz.ca.

During regular business hours journalists on assignment can contact corporate spokespeople directly at the following addresses:

Manon.Stuart@flyjazz.ca (Canada East / Atlantic and French)
Teri.Udle@flyjazz.ca (United States)
Melchior.Schori@flyjazz.ca (United States)
media@flyjazz.ca

Jazz Airlines Official website: http://flyjazz.ca/en/

Jazz Airlines Online Check-in: www.Jazz Airlines.com/in/gb/online check-in

Check Jazz Airlines schedule here: www.Jazz Airlines.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Jazz Airlines flight status here: www.Jazz Airlines.com/in/gb/flight status

Jazz Airlines Baggage Allowance

Jazz Airlines Baggage

View Jazz Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Check Jazz airlines In-Flight menu here

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Jazz Airlines

Total fleet: 116

Queries handled by Jazz Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Aeroplan (Air Canada)

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Jazz Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Jazz Airlines: (click on the stars below)
